content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: ScanOrigin path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/origins/scan content: sum scan an origin
desc scan an origin from stackpaths cdn retrieve information regarding the origin such as its ip address and whether or not it supports ssl
reqbody
cdnscanoriginrequest
type obj
domain
type str
desc the hostname to scan
required true
responses
200
cdnscanoriginresponse
type obj
props
ipaddress
type str
desc the ip address that was scanned
hostname
type str
desc the hostname that was scanned
scanoriginresponseoriginscanssldetails
type obj
props
valid
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not the scanned domain has a valid ssl certificate
error
type str
desc errors encountered processing https requests to the scanned domain
desc ssl details in an origin scan response
domaininuse
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not the scanned domain is already in use on the stackpath platform
desc the response from a request to scan a url from the stackpath edge network
title: 10_Infrastructure_ScanOrigin_62.json
